name: The Blue Mask Files Demo
description:
story: your name is Zyler and you mysteriously woke up in a school and all your desperate to get out but the door's locked and the blue masked cult is looking for people to take to their dimension to make them one of them and all you have is a blue mask to trick them into thinking your one of them and a camera to scare them away if they reach into your room and check your camera to see if somebody enters the vents

How to play:

if you are at the starting room press on the right button key to run to the room with the window to see if an entity is there press on the left key to go back

If you are at the starting room press on the left button key to run to the room with the computer to recharge your camera, press on the right key to go back

Camera: use the camera to flash enemies that come out of the window but be aware that you only have 10 flashes and if you run out then run to the left of the room and click recharge and it will instantly recharge your camera but there's a 60 cooldown

Mask: if a threat enters the room then quickly put on your mask they think that you are one of them and they will leave

Monitor: pull up your monitor to see if there are enemies in there and if you see them read the character's instructions and do what it says

Characters instruction:

Rachael: she appears in your window and enters at the perfect time a black flash will indicate that she is at your window run there and flash your camera so she can go away, another flash will tell you that she's inside quickly put on your mask so she will think that your apart of the blue mask cult and leave you alone and go back to the window, not doing it will result in a jumpscare.

George: he will climb in the vents so check your camera often and if you see him in the vents then press the overheat button to get rid of him and if he isn't on the cameras anymore than its too late cause he will jumpscare you even with the mask on
